title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Check the user account is created and user is logged in.

title: User Registration Failure with Invalid Email
description: Ensure registration fails when an invalid email format is submitted.

steps.description: Go to the registration page.
Input valid username and password with invalid email format.
Try to submit the registration form.
Verify proper validation error message for invalid email is displayed and registration is blocked.

title: User Login Success
description: Confirm user can log in with correct credentials.

steps.description: Open the login page.
Enter registered username/email and correct password.
Submit the login form.
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Incorrect Password
description: Verify system prevents login with wrong password and shows error message.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Enter valid username/email and wrong password.
Click login.
Check error message is displayed and login is denied.

title: Bulk Lot Image Upload via Drag and Drop
description: Verify multiple images can be uploaded by drag and drop with preview and edit options.

steps.description: Open bulk lot image upload interface.
Drag and drop multiple valid image files into the upload area.
Confirm image previews are shown with options to edit or remove each image.

title: Bulk Lot Image Upload via File Selector
description: Verify multiple images can be selected and uploaded via file selector with preview and edit options.

steps.description: Open the upload interface.
Use file selector to choose multiple valid image files.
Verify image preview thumbnails appear with editing/removal options.

title: Unsupported File Format Upload Handling
description: Ensure the system rejects unsupported file formats during image upload with appropriate error feedback.

steps.description: Attempt to upload unsupported file formats (e.g. .exe, .txt) via upload interface.
Check that upload is blocked and meaningful error messages are displayed.

title: AI Vision API Item Recognition Accuracy Above Threshold
description: Test that AI vision API identifies items correctly with confidence scores above 80% for common categories.

steps.description: Upload known test images containing collectible items representing common categories.
Trigger AI item recognition processing.
Verify items are identified correctly with confidence scores >= 80%.

title: Handling AI Vision API Failure
description: Verify system handles AI vision API timeout or failure gracefully providing relevant feedback to the user.

steps.description: Simulate AI vision API failure or timeout after uploading images.
Confirm user is notified of processing error and system allows retry or alternative actions.

title: Fetching Real-time eBay Sold Prices and Active Listings
description: Validate that eBay data retrieval returns real-time sold prices and active listings within 5 seconds per request.

steps.description: Trigger eBay data fetching for identified items.
Measure response time; ensure results include sold price, listing counts, and historical pricing within 5 seconds.

title: Fallback Scraper Activation on eBay API Failure
description: Confirm the system activates scraper fallback to retrieve eBay data if official API fails.

steps.description: Cause eBay official API to fail or be unreachable during data fetch.
Verify that scraper fallback activates and eBay data is still retrieved correctly.

title: Value Calculation Engine Accuracy Within Margin
description: Verify the value calculation engine computes lot values within a 15% margin of accuracy using GPT estimates and statistical filtering.

steps.description: Process bulk lot analysis with known datasets.
Check final lot valuation is accurate within 15% margin compared to benchmark values.

title: Outlier Filtering in Value Calculation
description: Verify that statistical filtering effectively identifies and removes pricing outliers from calculations.

steps.description: Analyze bulk lot data including known price outliers.
Confirm outliers are excluded from final value aggregation.

title: Results Table Interactivity and Sorting
description: Ensure results are displayed in a sortable, interactive table with summary statistics and eBay search links.

steps.description: Complete bulk lot analysis and view results table.
Verify columns can be sorted ascending and descending, summary stats are accurate, and eBay search links open correct pages.

title: CSV Export of Analysis Results
description: Verify user can export lot analysis results to a CSV file that contains all relevant data accurately.

steps.description: Perform lot analysis.
Click on export to CSV button.
Confirm CSV file downloads and contains all expected fields and data matching the results table.

title: Analysis History Retrieval and Display
description: Validate that users can view and retrieve their previous analysis history accurately.

steps.description: Log in to user account with existing analysis history.
Navigate to analysis history page.
Verify past analyses are listed with correct details and can be re-opened.

title: System Performance Under 50 Concurrent Users
description: Test system stability and response times when 50 users perform analysis concurrently.

steps.description: Simulate 50 simultaneous user sessions conducting lot uploads and analyses.
Verify stable system performance, no crashes, and API response times under 10 seconds.

title: API Response Time Within SLA
description: Confirm all API endpoints respond within 10 seconds under normal usage conditions.

steps.description: Measure response times of main APIs including image processing, eBay data fetching, and value calculation.
Assert all API responses complete within 10 seconds.

title: UI Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify UI components and pages conform to WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards.

steps.description: Run accessibility audits on main user workflows using automated tools and manual keyboard navigation.
Confirm no critical accessibility issues and all controls are usable via keyboard and assistive technologies.

title: Robust Error Handling and Logging for User Interactions
description: Ensure all user interactions handle errors gracefully and log errors appropriately for diagnostics.

steps.description: Simulate errors in user workflows, including upload failures, API errors, and authentication issues.
Verify informative error messages are shown and error events are captured in system logs.

title: Server-side Image Optimization and Thumbnail Generation
description: Validate that uploaded images are optimized server-side and thumbnails are generated correctly in expected formats.

steps.description: Upload images of various sizes and formats.
Check optimized images and thumbnails are stored and accessible with correct dimensions and quality.

title: Session Management and JWT Refresh Tokens
description: Verify session persists correctly and JWT refresh tokens renew sessions without requiring user login.

steps.description: Log in and obtain JWT token.
Wait for token expiration time.
Ensure the refresh token is used to renew JWT token automatically.
Confirm user remains logged in with seamless session continuity.

title: Security Vulnerability Scan for Authentication System
description: Check that authentication system has no critical security flaws such as weak password storage or token leakage.

steps.description: Perform penetration testing and static code analysis on auth modules.
Verify passwords are hashed securely, tokens are stored and transmitted safely, and no critical vulnerabilities exist.

title: Continuous Integration Workflow Trigger
description: Validate that configured GitHub Actions workflows run automated testing and linting on pull requests.

steps.description: Create a new pull request with code changes.
Verify automated tests and linting are triggered and complete successfully.

title: System Uptime and Performance Monitoring Alerts
description: Check that real-time performance monitoring captures metrics and triggers alerts on anomalies or downtime.

steps.description: Simulate system performance degradation or outage.
Verify monitoring dashboard updates and alerts are sent automatically.
